nukedpl: Mass delyte bi the DPL querie
nukedpl-desc: Eiks ae [[Special:NukeDPL|byordiair page]] fer the mass delytion bi the DPL querie
nukedpl-intro:
This tuil permits mass delytions o pages selectit bi ae DPL querie.

Enter ae querie ablo tae generate ae leet o titles tae delyte.
* Titles can be indiveeduallie remuivved afore delytinie.
* Mynd, page titles ar case-sensiteeve.
* Queries shidna be surroundit bi onie DPL tags or braces.
* Fer information aneat the boondin meanins, see the [http://semeb.com/dpldemo/index.php?title=DPL:Manual DPL Manual].
nukedpl-nopages: Nae pages tae delyte uisin the DPL querie: $1
nukedpl-list: The follaein {{PLURAL:$1|page wis|pages were}} selectit bi the DPL querie: $2 Hit "{{int:nukedpl-nuke}}" tae delyte {{PLURAL:$1|it|thaim}}.
nukedpl-defaultreason: Mass remuival o pages selectit bi ae DPL querie: $1
right-nukedpl: Nuke pages bi the Dynameec Page Leet queries
